description: This file contains unit tests for network information iterators and adapters, utilizing Google Test framework. It tests classes such as AdapterIterator, IPV4AddressIterator, IPV6AddressIterator, and AdapterObserver, focusing on their iteration and state management functionalities within the WPEFramework Core namespace.

classes.name: AdapterIterator
classes.description: Iterator class for network adapters, providing methods to query and manipulate adapter state.

classes.name: IPV4AddressIterator
classes.description: Iterator for IPv4 addresses associated with network adapters.

classes.name: IPV6AddressIterator
classes.description: Iterator for IPv6 addresses associated with network adapters.

classes.name: AdapterObserver
classes.description: Observer class for network adapter events.

methods.name: Next
methods.description: Advances the iterator to the next element.

methods.name: Name
methods.description: Returns the name of the adapter.

methods.name: IsUp
methods.description: Checks if the adapter is up.

methods.name: IsRunning
methods.description: Checks if the adapter is running.

methods.name: MACAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the adapter.
